name: Love is Blind (Sivasanjeevi)
description:
The game has multiple endings play it till the end. Its also easy to play.Everyone can finish this game.

Instructions :

The below panel represent 4 types of towers

Darter : Quick and accurate shooting but does less damage

SAMG : Sprays bullets all over the enemy

Vaporizer : Produces harmful radiation to kill enemies

BombTower : Destroys enemies with huge blast

Click on the image to select a tower and click again on any of the platform to place the tower

Dont let your lover with too much zombies she is not strong enough to defeat them

Please let me know the feed backs for improving this game

Thanks in advance.
